com.nfcalarmclock

Class NacCardTouchHelper.Callback

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.ItemTouchHelper.Callback
      • com.nfcalarmclock.NacCardTouchHelper.Callback
  • Enclosing class:
    NacCardTouchHelper

    public static class NacCardTouchHelper.Callback
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.ItemTouchHelper.Callback
    Handle callback events when swiping card.
